channel.title: Info3 Material on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen
channel.description: Recent content in Info3 Material on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen

item.title: e-Learning Video Summary
item.description:
This e-learning is about watching one of the many talks about Agile Software Development / Software Craftship / S.O.L.I.D. or TDD principles available on YouTube and summarizing it.

I’ll post a more detailed overview of my recommendations later this week.

For the summary, consider doing it as a sketchnote; see my Sketchnotes page for a pointer how to start. Upload your summary/sketchnote together with the video reference & link (see the Info on Scribbr on how to reference a YouTube Video)

item.title: e-learning reviews - Software Design Patterns (GOF) or Clean Code
item.description:
This e-learning is about watching reviewing your own and another python project and apply clean code principles and/or find patterns that are worth applying for the project.

I will add instructions on how to upload your project later this week and will do a raffle on saturday for the “other” project.
